content: शतं {@--1@} A hundred; निःस्वो वष्टि शतं <ls>Śānti. 2. 6</ls>; शतमेकोपि संधत्ते प्राकारस्थो धनुर्धरः <ls>Pt. 1. 229</ls>; (शत is used in the singular with a plural noun of any gender; शतं नराः; शतं गावः; or शतं गृहाणि, in which case it is treated as a numeral adjective; but sometimes in dual and plural also; द्वे शते; दश शतानि &c. It is also used with a noun in the genitive; गवां शतं, वर्षाणां शतं ‘a century of cows, years’ &c At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>, it may remain unchanged; भव भर्ता शरच्छतं, or may be changed into शती; as in आर्यासप्तशती a work of Govardhanāchārya.) {@--2@} Any large number; as in शतपत्र <ab>q. v.</ab>
